title: US Justice Dept Opens Civil Rights Probe Into Alex Pretti Shooting
summary_full: The U.S. Justice Department has started a civil rights investigation intothe fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by a federal immigration officer in Minneapolis, a senior official said.
summary_public: The U.S. Justice Department has started a civil rights investigation intothe fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by a federal immigration officer in Minneapolis, a senior official said.
